abstract: Ron Sturzenegger was tapped to run Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s Legacy Asset Servicing division, which includes tens of billions of dollars of mortgage assets and home loans that are delinquent or in default.
snippet: Ron Sturzenegger was tapped to run Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s Legacy Asset Servicing division, which includes tens of billions of dollars of mortgage assets and home loans that are delinquent or in default.
lead_paragraph: It’s one of the toughest jobs in banking.

headline.main: Bank of America Names Executive to Oversee Bad Loan Portfolio
